result.purpose: This folder is responsible for containing unit tests for various service functionalities within the application.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, focusing on unit testing individual service components to ensure functionality and reliability.

tests/services/atia_blessing_test.go.purpose: Unit tests for the Atia blessing service functionality.

tests/services/check_in_game_test.go.purpose: Contains unit tests for the check-in game service functionality.

tests/services/check_in_wallet_test.go.purpose: Unit test for the CheckInWalletService's CheckInStreak method.

tests/services/distribute_reward_test.go.purpose: Unit tests for the reward distribution service in the Ronin wallet application.

tests/services/offchain_action_test.go.purpose: Unit tests for off-chain action functionality in the services package.

tests/services/ron_staked_test.go.purpose: Unit tests for the staking service related to quest completion in the Ronin wallet services.
